webscript.description: Return all documents in the specified site in format that shows containment: { "name" : projectname, "volumes": {mdid: volumename}, "volume2volumes": {volumeid: [volumeid, ...], ...}, "documents": {documentid: documentname, ...}, "volume2documents": {volumeid: [documentid], ...}, "projectVolumes": [volumeid,...] }

arg.name: id
arg.description: Name of the site to find all documents in, e.g. /ve/documents/europa gets all the documents in the europa site.
